name: Echoes of the Hüttenjam
description:
Instructions:

Explore the village and collect clues. Use [c] to open your diary where you need to reconstruct the story using the clues you found. Keep track of the context in which you found them, as this is crucial information.

Background:

Enjoy the dark atmosphere in our breathtaking simulation of mysterious happinings at a chalet village in the mountains where a gamejam should have taken place.

As you got stuck in the snow with your car, you arrived late in the day just to find out that you are alone. Everyone in the village is gone and you have limited time to find out what happened here.

Find all clues and reconstruct the story of the Echoes of the Hüttenjam.

Team:

  • Andreas Leibetseder
  • Christoph Karisch
  • Daniela Meinhardt
  • Fabian Schober
  • Guido Prodnik

Thx for music to:

  • Peter Hafele
  • Stefan Putzinger
